a transparent body, as of glass, whose ends are equal and parallel triangles, and whose three sides are parallelograms, used for refracting or dispersing light, as into the spectrum; a prism.

(dance.) a single-hand gesture, bending the ring-finger, and extending other fingers upward, and bending the thumb as to touch the base of the forefinger, to express touching of auspicious things, calling, disrespect, bidding good-bye, etc.
the tree Aegle marmelos of Rutaceae family.
its trifoliate leaves.
the tree Butea frondosa of Papilionaceae family; bastard teak; flame of the forest.
= ತ್ರಿಪತ್ರ - 2.
